patterns: how many countries are there in qworld?
responses: QWorld Association (QWorld) is a non-profit organization that globally brings quantum computing researchers & enthusiasts together. Through education and skill development opportunities, QWorld is training the next generation of quantum scientists. Read more here: https://qworld.net/about-us/
QWorld is a non profit NGO, read more here: https://qworld.net/about-us/
visit this page to know more: https://qworld.net/about-us/

patterns: how do i get in touch?

for our social media visit our website: https://qworld.net/contact/

I was developed by abdulmoiz and he named me QBot, QW stands for qworld :)

patterns: what can you help me with?
responses: Overall, my job is to serve information related to QWorld, I can also tell some jokes and serve links to cat pictures :)
You can ask me information about QWorld, related events etc.
